short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark mode and improvements for Securly Flex

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves the Securly Flex user experience by adding a dark mode option, more customization options, and breathtaking performance improvements

Adds options to:
- change the default schedule tab
- change the default screen that shows up when you go to https://flex.securly.com
- flex into multiple sessions at once

https://securly-plus.kameswar.com/

https://github.com/grimsteel/securly-plus

Securly is a registered trademark of Securly, Inc.
